data.name: The Mechanical Bride
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

The desire to bring to life the perfect artificial woman is as old as Pygmalion, but new technologies are making its realization ever more likely. In this provocative and eye-opening documentary, you'll journey from the outer limits of science fiction fantasy—visiting classic scenes of fembots in film and television—to the current-day reality of artificial companions, from life-sized silicone love dolls to humanoid robots. Narrated by screen icon and former television android Julie Newmar.
data.about_the_game: The desire to bring to life the perfect artificial woman is as old as Pygmalion, but new technologies are making its realization ever more likely. In this provocative and eye-opening documentary, you'll journey from the outer limits of science fiction fantasy—visiting classic scenes of fembots in film and television—to the current-day reality of artificial companions, from life-sized silicone love dolls to humanoid robots. Narrated by screen icon and former television android Julie Newmar.
data.short_description: Discover the state of the art in artificial companions—from life-sized silicone love dolls to humanoid robots—and the men who build, animate, and love them.
data.reviews:
“a moving, weirdly human exploration of artificial companionship”
Wired Magazine

“Besides the fascinating topic, interesting subjects and the love taken by the filmmaker to portray these people, this is also an expertly put-together film.”
Spotlight Toronto

“arguably the most terrifying film I have seen in a long time”
Twitch Film

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
